I started to hang the do not disturb sign all the time until i left for the day, but this is the first time I've ever needed to use it in this way. A quick heads up to anyone travelling from the UK with UK Shaving plugs - they dont fit into European sockets, and I wasn't able to find a suitable adapter in multiple tech shops in Berlin. There are no shaving plugs in the bathroom to charge electric shavers/toothbrushes etc. So, make sure you pack a shaving adapter for European sockets.
The TV in the hotel room was also fairly dated - whilst I understand that in Germany, the majority of channels will be in German (with the exception of BBC World News), the TV was a fairly dated model and unable to link to devices, so we were unable to stream anything to the TV that we might want to watch.
Still enjoyed the trip to the beautiful city of Berlin, but would be looking elsewhere for accommodation next time.
